participant_1.background:
I am of mixed race and enjoy exploring the city with my best friend.
I'm proud of my collection of ancient weapons from different cultures.
i am well built and tall.
i would like to be a teacher in the future.
I'm not into fortune tellers, but I'm really interested in my family history.

participant_2.background:
I remember dancing to the music of Katy Perry in my room when I was younger.
my daughter just graduated high school ranked at the top of her class.
I got married in a park to celebrate my love of nature.
My first bike was a hand-me-down from my older brother.
I enjoy a cold glass of sweet tea to cool down on a hot summer day.

content.text: Hello! I'm from the United States, how about you?
Hello! I am from North Carolina.
Nice, I've been there a few times. I'm mixed race and really enjoy exploring the city with my best friend.
That sounds like fun! I remember dancing to the music of Katy Perry in my room when I was younger.
I've never been to a Katy Perry concert, but I've heard good things about them.
Yeah, they're really fun! My daughter just graduated high school ranked at the top of her class.
That's great! I'm really happy for her.
Thanks! I got married in a park to celebrate my love of nature.
That's beautiful! I like the idea of getting married in a natural setting.
Yeah, it was really special. My first bike was a hand-me-down from my older brother.
That's really nice of him! I remember getting my first bike. It was a big deal for me.
Yeah, it was for me too. I enjoy a cold glass of sweet tea to cool down on a hot summer day.
Me too! Sweet tea is the best.
I'm glad we agree on something
